com.complexible.common.openrdf.query

Class Datasets

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.openrdf.query.Datasets

  • public final class Datasets
extends Object

    Utility class for working with Dataset

    Since:
    2.0.2
    Version:
    2.0.2
    Author:
    Michael Grove

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.openrdf.query.Dataset EMPTY
      A Dataset which is empty, that is, it's comprised of zero graphs.
      static org.openrdf.query.Dataset NO_DATASET
      Constant for specifying that there is no specific dataset; a Query should use whatever information is in its from/from named clauses.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create a Dataset which is the union of all the graphs which will specify the default graph of the dataset
      static org.openrdf.query.Dataset of(org.openrdf.model.URI theGraph, org.openrdf.model.URI... theOtherGraphs)
      Create a new Dataset which is the union of all the specified graphs which will comprise the default graph of the dataset

      static org.openrdf.query.Dataset union(org.openrdf.query.Dataset theDataset, org.openrdf.query.Dataset theOtherDataset)

      • NO_DATASET

        public static final org.openrdf.query.Dataset NO_DATASET
        Constant for specifying that there is no specific dataset; a Query should use whatever information is in its from/from named clauses.
